Company: AIBD - American Institute of Building Design
Description:
The American Institute of Building Design (AIBD) is the national professional association for residential building designers, established in 1950 to advance and protect the building design profession.¬†
Who AIBD Represents
AIBD represents design professionals who specialize in single-family and light commercial residential projects, including custom homes, remodeling, and community-scale design. Members include Certified Professional Building Designers, architects, engineers, and related design professionals committed to high standards of practice and ethics.¬†
Mission and Focus
AIBD‚Äôs mission is to protect and enhance its members‚Äô ability to practice building design while promoting excellence, innovation, and consumer choice in residential design. The organization develops and upholds nationwide design standards and a code of ethics that support quality, safety, and professionalism in the built environment.¬†
Education and Certification
AIBD provides robust continuing education to keep members current with evolving technologies, materials, sustainability practices, and building codes. Through its related certification programs, it recognizes professionals who demonstrate verified knowledge, experience, and a strong commitment to ongoing professional development.¬†
Value to Builders and Consumers
Builders and developers partnering with AIBD members gain access to designers who understand constructability, cost-efficiency, and marketability, helping projects move smoothly from concept to completion. For homeowners and buyers, the AIBD name signals a trusted design professional dedicated to functional, beautiful, and code-compliant residential environments.

Alufem Aluminium operates in the Kayseri Organized Industrial Zone, providing customer-oriented, fast, and innovative services within a 50,000 m¬≤ enclosed production facility. The plant houses aluminium extrusion press lines, polishing surface treatment machines, anodizing facilities, electrostatic powder coating units, wood-effect lamination systems, CNC mechanical processing centers, assembly lines, and expert teams.¬†
Our company has an annual production capacity of over 27,000 tons of aluminium profiles with extrusion press lines of 1,100 USTons (5‚Äù), 2,000 USTons (7‚Äù), and 4,000 MTons (10‚Äù). We manufacture profiles in various alloys through T0, T4, T5, and T6 heat treatment processes.¬†
In our anodizing facility, matte, bright, and satin finishes can be applied up to 7.5 meters in length with an annual capacity of 4,000,000 m¬≤. Coloring demands ranging from light bronze to black are met using Tin Sulphate and Nickel Sulphate baths.¬†
The aluminium wood-effect lamination machine enhances production flexibility by allowing rapid and efficient color changes. It is designed to provide durable and reliable wood-effect coating on aluminium profile surfaces. A wood-like appearance is applied to aluminium profiles through high-quality production and assembly processes.¬†
Our vertical and horizontal electrostatic powder coating facilities offer a service capacity of 28,000 tons/year, covering all RAL codes and architectural coating standards. The powder coating units are designed to be completely isolated from external environmental factors, and production is carried out with fully automatic, process-controlled cabin systems.¬†
Within our facility, 3- and 4-axis CNC profile machining centers, CNC double-head angular saws, precision cutting machines, and custom process machinery lines enable meticulous and rapid execution of mechanical operations as required by our customers.¬†
In our R&D center, we provide design and technical support in line with customer demands, working with a focus on maximum quality and satisfaction.

¬†The company was set up in Stuttgart in 1886 by Robert Bosch (1861‚Äì1942) as ‚ÄúWorkshop for Precision Mechanics and Electrical Engineering.‚Äù The special ownership structure of Robert Bosch GmbH guarantees the entrepreneurial freedom of the Bosch Group, making it possible for the company to plan over the long term and to undertake significant upfront investments in the safeguarding of its future. Ninety-four percent of the share capital of Robert Bosch GmbH is held by Robert Bosch Stiftung GmbH, a charitable foundation. It is entrusted with the task of safeguarding the company‚Äôs long-term existence and in particular its financial independence ‚Äì in line with the mission handed down in the will of the company‚Äôs founder, Robert Bosch.¬†

ClearView Glass Railings is a glass railing supplier located in Minnesota. Unlike hardwoods, glass railings don‚Äôt need repeated painting or finishing for enhancing their durability. This is a vital consideration since decks/patios are continuously exposed to external, weather conditions. CVGRailings Hercules Glass panels use tempered laminated panels with patent pending Lever Spigots made of Duplex 2205 Stainless Steel.¬†
Neither glass nor the patent pending Lever Spigots made of Duplex 2205 Stainless Steel corrode when exposed to water. The outer surface of glass panels is better suited to tolerate temperature extremes. As a result, unlike hardwood railings, glass railings are not vulnerable to surface cracking.¬†
CVGRailings Hercules Glass panels are test proven to hold an amazing 2,520# vertical load and a 820# horizontal load. They are 13.5mm thick tempered laminated glass made with two layers of 6mm tempered glass that is laminated together with a 1.5mm layer of a PVB plastic glass panel.¬†
This makes glass railings as sturdy and safe as wood or purely metal based railings. The use of transparent glass ensures that visibility through the deck is maintained. Blocking of the external view is a major issue with metal/wood railings.

High Tech Pet Products offers a comprehensive suite of cutting-edge pet doors, combining security, weather resistance, and smart technology. Their lineup includes:¬†


Power‚ÄØPet‚ÄØDoor: Fully automatic and motor-driven, this door opens only when triggered by a pet wearing a tiny ultrasonic collar. It uses directional sensing so it activates only when the pet is directly approaching, minimizing false triggers. The translucent, high-strength poly carbonate panel slides up and down on a tight seal and locks with a deadbolt, ensuring strong insulation and security¬†


WiFi-Enabled Power Pet Doors (e.g., Power‚ÄØPet WiFi Door): These retain all the core features of the Power Pet series while adding remote control through a smartphone app. Users can open/close the door, configure up to 20 weekly access timers, adjust sensor ranges, and view a log of door activity.¬†


Motorized Power Pet Roll-Up Doors: These doors ‚Äî available in medium, large, and extra-large sizes ‚Äî feature a motorized roll-up panel (rather than a rigid flap) that retracts upward. Activation is via the same ultrasonic collar, and the door is controllable via the Power Pet app. It provides strong insulation, security, low draft, and 4-way access control.¬†


Armor Flex Manual Doors (e.g., Armor‚ÄØFlex Pet Door): These are engineered to be extremely durable and weather-tight. Their flap is made from interlocking ABS segments, each sealed by rare-earth magnets to ensure a rigid, airtight closure along the sides yet flexible enough for your pet to pass through. The frame is heavy-gauge aluminum with stainless steel hardware.¬†


DuraFlex (DuraFlex) Pet Door: Designed for lifetime durability, these doors feature a strong yet flexible vinyl flap surrounded by a wide flange with embedded rare-earth magnets. The frame is made of high-strength aluminum, sealed with floating magnetic seals for a 100% airtight, draft-free fit‚Äîeven in winds up to 50 mph¬†



Why choose High Tech Pet? Their pet doors combine smart automation, durable construction, and exceptional sealing, backed by decades of innovation. Whether you want a fully automatic, app-controlled door like their Power Pet or a rugged, energy-efficient manual flap like Armor Flex or DuraFlex, High Tech Pet delivers premium access solutions that enhance both pet freedom and home security.

At our core, InSoFast is focused on performance-driven innovation. We design insulation systems to solve real-world challenges including thermal bridging, condensation, mold risk, and labor inefficiency. Every product is engineered to work as part of a complete system‚Äîreducing complexity on the jobsite while improving building outcomes for contractors, designers, and owners alike.¬†
All InSoFast products are¬†manufactured in the USA, and we ship to¬†all lower 48 U.S. states and Canada, delivering directly to the project site to simplify logistics and scheduling. Our team prides themselves on supporting projects with excellent customer service, personalized recommendations and access to technical experts throughout the project.¬†
InSoFast Insulation Panels¬†
InSoFast insulation panels are the foundation of our system approach. Designed for¬†interior,¬†exterior, and¬†shipping container¬†applications, these panels combine continuous insulation with built-in attachment points for finishes, eliminating the need for traditional framing in many assemblies.¬†

Interior Panels¬†help transform basements, retrofit spaces, and new construction by improving thermal performance while creating a ready-to-finish surface.
Exterior Panels¬†deliver continuous insulation to reduce thermal bridging and supports durable, high-performance building envelopes.
Shipping Container Panels¬†address one of the most challenging building types by controlling condensation, improving comfort, and streamlining interior¬†projects.

Together, these panels help projects move faster while supporting energy-efficient, code-compliant construction.¬†
The X-Bracket System¬†
The¬†X‚ÄëBracket System¬†is a structural framing innovation designed for both¬†residential construction¬†and¬†shipping container projects. This advanced polymer bracket system replaces much of the traditional lumber framing required in walls, creating strong, straight, and thermally efficient assemblies.¬†
By reducing wood usage and eliminating thermal bridging, the X-Bracket System supports healthier indoor environments while enabling builders to frame faster with greater consistency. It integrates seamlessly with InSoFast insulation panels, creating a unified system that enhances performance without adding complexity.¬†
Introducing the Batt-Bracket (Coming 2026)¬†
Launching in¬†January 2026, the Batt‚ÄëBracket¬†expands InSoFast solutions to support traditional batt insulation within a smarter framing framework. The Batt-Bracket provides flexibility for projects which require or prefer batt insulation‚Äîwithout sacrificing alignment, performance, or efficiency.¬†
Built for Builders. Designed for Performance.¬†
From manufacturing in the United States to delivering directly to job sites across the lower 48 states and¬†Canada, InSoFast is committed to helping builders succeed. Our systems are trusted on projects ranging from homes and multifamily buildings to commercial spaces and innovative shipping container developments.¬†
Step into the future of insulation with InSoFast, we‚Äôd love to partner on your next project!

Kimsun Doors & Windows: The Perfect Fusion of Exquisite Craftsmanship and Innovative Design¬†
Born from Mastery, Defining the Art of Premium Doors and Windows¬†
Kimsun Doors & Windows is an enterprise specializing in the design, manufacturing, and sales of high-end custom doors and windows. Distinguished within the industry for its exceptional craftsmanship, innovative technology, and unique design style, the company is dedicated to perfectly integrating "artistic aesthetics" with "practical functionality". It provides globally recognized, "superior quality door and window products, redefining the spatial experience of modern home living.¬†
Masterful Craftsmanship, Uncompromising Quality¬†
Kimsun's pursuit of quality is evident in every detail. The company selects "imported North American red oak or pine (Larch)" as primary raw materials, ensuring product stability and durability. Every single door and window is meticulously designed and crafted, surpassing national standards in key performance indicators such as "waterproofing, anti-corrosion, noise reduction, dust insulation, and warp resistance".¬†
In terms of technical craftsmanship, Kimsun utilizes "hardware fittings from renowned German brands like GU and SIEGENIA". The company also incorporates "composite eco-friendly materials and production processes from German suppliers", ensuring products are not only aesthetically pleasing but also boast outstanding practical performance.¬†
Innovative Design, Leading Trends¬†
Kimsun adheres to a design philosophy where "innovation coexists with beauty". The company perfectly blends "Italian fashion design concepts" with "German precision engineering", creating numerous door and window products that combine European style.¬†
The product line encompasses four major categories for the whole home: "Tilt&Turn window, Fixed window, Casement window, Awning window, Sliding door, casement door and folding door", offering a "one-stop procurement solution for whole-home windows and doors customization". The company particularly highlights its "new coordinated color and finish whole-home door customization", allowing consumers to match door products to their floor color, achieving true harmony in living spaces.¬†
Kimsun's design team keeps pace with international trends, continuously introducing "youthful, fashionable, and minimalist" design series to meet the needs of modern consumers seeking personalized home decor. These designs focus not only on visual appeal but also carefully consider space utilization and functionality, making each door and window a focal point of home artistry.¬†
Technological R&D, Industry Leadership¬†
Kimsun maintains a strategy of "technology-driven development". It has established the "Kimsun Door Design Center" in Italy and the "Kimsun Door Engineering and Technology R&D Center" in Germany. These international R&D institutions provide the company with access to world-leading design concepts and process technologies.¬†
The company pioneered the "Deconstructed Assembly Process" within the domestic door industry, completely overturning traditional Chinese door manufacturing methods and achieving "standardized component production". This innovation not only ensures stable product quality and environmental performance from the source but also significantly improves the delivery efficiency of custom products.¬†
In glass technology, Kimsun employs "Double / Triple silver low-E glass", providing excellent thermal insulation properties that comply with international standards like AS2047/NFRC, ensuring outstanding performance in energy efficiency.¬†
Global Vision, Diverse Services¬†
Kimsun possesses a broad "international perspective", with products exported globally, including to the US market. The company has a deep understanding of the needs of clients in different regions, providing professional door and window solutions for various sectors such as "residential homes, SOHO, government departments, hotels, and banks", meeting diverse functional requirements across society.¬†
The company has established a comprehensive national sales network with over "300 brand franchise stores", ensuring timely and attentive service for customers. Whether for standard home renovation or large-scale projects, Kimsun provides professional customization services, earning consistent recognition from a wide range of users.¬†
Environmental Philosophy, Sustainable Development¬†
Kimsun actively implements a "green environmental protection" ethos, having successfully developed the "Kimsun" brand of "highly eco-friendly residential wood doors". The company uses environmentally friendly materials, complies with green building material standards, and is committed to reducing the environmental impact throughout the product lifecycle.¬†
The company's environmental commitment extends beyond the products themselves, permeating the entire manufacturing process. By optimizing production techniques, improving resource efficiency, and reducing waste emissions, Kimsun strives to be an environmental benchmark in the home building materials industry.¬†
Future Outlook¬†
Looking ahead, Kimsun Doors & Windows will continue to uphold the business philosophy of "Forging the Brand with Quality, Winning the Future with Innovation." The company remains steadfast in its commitment to providing high-quality products and services to consumers nationwide. Driven by "technological innovation" and guided by "customer needs", Kimsun will continuously introduce more exquisitely designed, high-quality door and window products, aiming to build a leading brand for fashionable doors and windows in China and tirelessly work to enhance the home living quality of its customers.¬†
Kimsun Doors & Windows ‚Äì not merely spatial dividers, but the perfect blend of art and living.

Moasure, founded in 2014, are revolutionizing how professionals measure and document spaces with their unique, patented motion sensor-based technology.¬†

Automatically calculating perimeter, area, elevation, gradient and volume, Moasure collects essential measurement data without the need for GPS, Wi-Fi or mobile phone signal.¬†
The Bluetooth-connected app transforms measurements into dynamic 2D and 3D visuals in real-time on your smartphone screen ‚Äì view, edit and save measurements, export as PDF/CSV or directly to CAD software.¬†
With over 100,000 Moasure 2 series devices sold to outdoor professionals, Moasure are now applying their award-winning technology to an indoor measuring device, designed to create instant floor plans with ease.¬†

LX1 offers a faster and smarter way to create accurate floor plans, fitting seamlessly into existing workflows.¬†

Schnell Home, a brand of the Schnell Group, sells machines for the production of the characteristic panels of the Concrewall construction system. The system is unique and simple: the basic element is a panel made up of a polystyrene core and two electro welded meshes joined together. The same factory can produce all the structural elements that make up the Concrewall system:¬†
¬∑ Double panel, used for load bearing walls;¬∑ Single panel, used for load bearing walls, partitions, and exterior walls;¬∑ Roof panels for flat or inclined roofs, as well as slabs for mezzanine floors and ceilings;¬∑ Staircases.¬†
Concrewall, used for the construction of private houses or industrialized buildings, proves to be an advantageous system in terms of quality of life, as it is earthquake resistant and provides thermal and acoustic insulation.¬†
The system is certified by Evaluation Report ESR-3429.

Overview
Sentry Building Innovations is a leading North American manufacturer and supplier of premium roofing and building envelope solutions. With a steadfast commitment to quality, performance, and innovation, Sentry delivers products that protect what matters most‚Äîresidential and commercial structures across the United States and Canada.¬†
Our Mission
To provide high-performance building materials that meet the evolving demands of modern construction, combining advanced technology with practical reliability to safeguard homes and buildings from the elements.¬†
What We Do
Sentry Building Innovations specializes in the development and distribution of cutting-edge waterproofing products, including synthetic roofing underlayments, weather-resistant barriers, and other protective materials for the building envelope. Our growing family of brands includes:¬†
- Roofnado‚Ñ¢ ‚Äì Take control with Roofnado‚Ñ¢Roofnado‚Ñ¢ is a trusted line of synthetic roofing underlayments engineered to serve as the critical water-control layer in modern roof systems. Designed to manage water before it becomes a problem, Roofnado products protect the roof deck from wind-driven rain, temporary exposure¬†
, and jobsite delays‚Äîputting control back in the hands of the installer.¬†
Built for durability, confident walkability, and long-term weather resistance, products like StormTread‚Ñ¢, AnchorDeck‚Ñ¢, and Spyder PSU‚Ñ¢ deliver dependable performance across a wide range of roofing applications. From new construction to re-roofing, Roofnado underlayments help ensure the roof system performs as intended‚Äîday one through the life of the roof.¬†
¬†¬†
- Spyder PSU‚Ñ¢ ‚Äì The ultimate sand replacement ice & water shield, engineered for modern roofing systems. This peel-and-stick synthetic underlayment delivers aggressive adhesion, reliable UV resistance, and confident walkability‚Äîwithout the mess, weight, or inconsistency of traditional sand-surfaced membranes.¬†
Its innovative design features a 3-inch overlap zone that securely bonds to the sheet below, speeding installation while creating a continuous, watertight seal on sloped roofs. Spyder PSU‚Ñ¢ puts installers in control with cleaner handling, faster installs, and dependable water protection where it matters most.¬†
¬†¬†
Sahara‚Ñ¢ WRBs ‚Äì High-performance weather-resistant barriers engineered with DRYZA‚Ñ¢ Smart Nano Technology to deliver controlled breathability and dependable protection against air and moisture infiltration. Designed to block bulk water while allowing water vapor to escape, Sahara WRBs support drying potential within the wall assembly‚Äîhelping protect the building envelope from moisture-related risk.¬†
Built for durability, consistent performance, and compatibility with modern tapes and flashings, Sahara‚Ñ¢ WRBs provide a critical balance of water resistance and vapor permeability for residential and light commercial construction.¬†
Innovation & Quality Assurance
Our products are developed with input from contractors and industry experts, ensuring real-world performance under tough conditions. Every product undergoes rigorous testing to meet and exceed industry standards, offering confidence to builders, roofers, and homeowners alike.¬†
Why Choose Sentry?
- Advanced Technology: Innovative materials that lead the market in strength, breathability, and ease of installation.- Contractor-Focused Design: Products developed with feedback from professionals who use them every day.- Reliable Supply Chain: Streamlined distribution and support across North America.- Warranty-Backed Products: Strong warranties including limited lifetime coverage on many systems.¬†

In terms of its product portfolio, the company has built a comprehensive product portfolio covering key home scenarios, including door and window systems, stair railings, integrated kitchen cabinets, custom wardrobes, bathroom cabinets, and solid wood doors. Door and window systems utilize high-strength profiles and energy-saving glass, providing both sound insulation and thermal insulation, as well as safety protection. Customized products (cabinets, wardrobes, bathroom cabinets, and wooden doors) are centered around personalization, allowing for customized designs tailored to the customer's home size, aesthetic preferences, and functional requirements. To provide customers with a worry-free and efficient customization experience, the company has established a "full-process closed-loop service system" that covers every step, from request communication to after-sales support. First, professional designers conduct on-site precise measurements, integrating the space's characteristics with the customer's needs to identify key requirements. Detailed design drawings and 3D renderings are then produced, allowing customers to visually preview the final result and quickly adjust and optimize based on feedback. Once the design is confirmed, production begins at our large-scale, modern production facility.¬†
The company's Foshan facility, spanning over 30, 000 square meters, is equipped with several industry-leading automated production lines, including CNC cutting machines, fully automatic edge banding machines, and precision drilling centers. This ensures an efficient flow from raw material processing to finished product assembly, with an annual production capacity capable of meeting demand for over 50, 000 whole-home customization units. Throughout the production process, a comprehensive quality control system, encompassing raw material testing, process inspections, and finished product spot checks, is in place. A professional quality inspection team and sophisticated testing equipment ensure that every product meets quality standards. Finally, an experienced installation team provides on-site professional installation, post-installation commissioning and acceptance services, and a comprehensive after-sales service record is established to provide customers with long-term user protection and maintenance support.¬†
Leveraging superior product quality, large-scale production capabilities, and efficient service capabilities, the company's products have successfully expanded to multiple regions around the world, with an export network covering countries and regions such as North America, Europe, Canada, Australia, and the Caribbean. The company localizes product adaptation and service optimization based on the building standards, climate characteristics, and consumer preferences of different overseas markets.

The SubAssist Suite is an end-to-end software ecosystem designed to protect subcontractor profit margins by automating the entire lifecycle of a job‚Äîfrom the first purchase order to the final invoice. It integrates three powerful modules to eliminate manual entry and pricing errors:¬†

V-ROD¬Æ Rebar is a high-performance, non-corrosive reinforcement made from glass fiber‚Äìreinforced polymer (GFRP). Engineered as a modern alternative to traditional steel rebar, V-ROD delivers exceptional strength, durability, and longevity in concrete structures‚Äîespecially in harsh or corrosive environments.¬†
Unlike steel, V-ROD will not rust, corrode, or degrade when exposed to moisture, salt, chemicals, or extreme temperatures. Its lightweight design makes handling and installation easier and safer, while its high tensile strength and thermal compatibility with concrete help extend the service life of structures.¬†
V-ROD rebar is commonly used in bridges, marine structures, parking garages, highways, industrial facilities, residential housing and other applications where long-term durability and reduced maintenance are critical. By eliminating corrosion-related damage, V-ROD helps lower lifecycle costs and supports more resilient, sustainable construction.

Washbox
Washbox is a global leader in professional washout and liquid waste management systems for the construction and custom home building sector. Founded by tradespeople and engineers, Washbox was created to solve one of the industry‚Äôs most persistent and overlooked challenges: uncontrolled tool washout that damages sites, risks compliance, and undermines professional standards.¬†
Designed specifically for modern residential and light commercial construction, Washbox products allow painters, builders, and contractors to clean tools efficiently on site while capturing and containing wash water, waste solids, and microplastic emissions. By keeping liquid waste on site and out of drainage systems, Washbox helps projects maintain clean working environments, protect surrounding communities, and uphold premium build standards.¬†
At NHBS, Washbox is showcasing its integrated range of practical, job ready solutions, including the Washbox Rocket mobile wash station, the ultra-portable Washbox Rover for vehicle based and residential work, and the RollerWash collar for fast, contained roller cleaning. Together, these products form a complete washout management system designed to fit seamlessly into everyday construction workflows.¬†
The Washbox Rocket is a battery powered, self-contained multi trade wash station that provides its own water supply and closed loop filtration system. It enables multiple trades to wash tools on site without plumbing connections, discharge points, or permanent infrastructure. Its compact, freestanding design makes it ideal for custom home builds, fit outs, and active renovation projects.¬†
The Washbox Rover extends this capability into ultra-portable applications, allowing professional washout to take place directly from a vehicle, driveway, or confined residential site. Built for contractors on the move, Rover delivers full containment and waste capture in a compact format suited to single family homes and small-scale projects.¬†
Complementing these systems, and also available as a standalone device to be used with nay garden hose, the Rollerwash collar provides painters with a simple, controlled method for washing and reusing rollers. By containing wash water and preventing splashing or runoff, it helps improve site cleanliness, extend tool life, and reduce unnecessary waste.¬†
All Washbox systems are designed around three core principles: efficiency, professionalism, and environmental responsibility. Every product is engineered to save time, reduce mess, and simplify compliance, while supporting higher standards of workmanship and site management.¬†
Washbox is also the world‚Äôs first app connected wash station platform, giving users access to a secure cloud dashboard where they can view water use, waste captured, and pollution prevented across individual projects or portfolios.
